TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbInfoMessageEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the event. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.InfoMessage> event contains an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection> collection with warnings sent from the data source.

Docs.summary: Gets the HRESULT following the ANSI SQL standard for the database.
Docs.value: The HRESULT, which identifies the source of the error, if the error can be issued from more than one place.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError.SQLState%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> in the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of warnings sent from the data source.
Docs.value: The collection of warnings sent from the data source.

Docs.summary: Gets the full text of the error sent from the data source.
Docs.value: The full text of the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError.Message%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> in the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the object that generated the error.
Docs.value: The name of the object that generated the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is a wrapper for the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError.Source%2A> property of the first <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> in the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbInfoMessageEventArgs.Errors%2A> collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a string representation of the event.
